metadata.title: CVE-2024-43796 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Express.js minimalist web framework for node. In express < 4.20.0, passinguntrusted user input - even after sanitizing it - to response.redirect()may execute untrusted code. This issue is patched in express 4.20.0.

criterions.comment: node-express package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
